## NounsOptions

Configuration options for the Nouns class.

### pollingTime

The polling time in milliseconds.

Type: [number][54]

## Account

An Ethereum account.

### id

The address id.

Type: [string][55]

## NounsTokenSeed

Seed object for Nouns tokens.

### background

0 to 1. Cool or warm.

Type: [number][54]

### body

0 to 29

Type: [number][54]

### accessory

0 to 136

Type: [number][54]

### head

0 to 233

Type: [number][54]

### glasses

0 to 20

Type: [number][54]

## VoteDirection

Vote options and their associated numbers.

### Examples

```javascript
AGAINST = 0;
FOR = 1;
ABSTAIN = 2;
```

## ProposalStatus

Possible proposal states.

Type: [string][55]

### Examples

```javascript
"ACTIVE" | "CANCELLED" | "EXECUTED" | "PENDING" | "QUEUED" | "VETOED"
```

## EventData

Event data types for contract listeners.

## DAOWithdrawNounsFromEscrow

DAOWithdrawNounsFromEscrow event data.

### tokenIds

List of tokens being withdrawn.

Type: [Array][56]<[number][54]>

### to

Address withdrawing the tokens.

Type: [Account][3]

### event

Event meta data.

Type: ethers.Event

## ERC20TokensToIncludeInForkSet

ERC20TokensToIncludeInForkSet event data.

### oldErc20Tokens

???

Type: [Array][56]<[string][55]>

### newErc20tokens

???

Type: [Array][56]<[string][55]>

### event

Event meta data.

Type: ethers.Event

## EscrowedToFork

EscrowedToFork event data.

### forkId

Fork number.

Type: [number][54]

### owner

Token owner who is escrowing to fork.

Type: [Account][3]

### tokenIds

List of tokens being escrowed.

Type: [Array][56]<[number][54]>

### proposalIds

Owner's currently active proposals being transferred to the fork.

Type: [Array][56]<[number][54]>

### reason

Optional reason.

Type: [string][55]

### event

Event meta data.

Type: ethers.Event

## ExecuteFork

ExecuteFork event data.

### forkId

Fork number.

Type: [number][54]

### forkTreasury

Fork treasury account.

Type: [Account][3]

### forkToken

Fork token account.

Type: [Account][3]

### forkEndTimestamp

???

Type: [number][54]

### tokensInEscrow

Tokens in escrow at the moment of the escrow. These are lost from the main treasury.

Type: [number][54]

### event

Event meta data.

Type: ethers.Event

## ForkDAODeployerSet

ForkDAODeployerSet event data.

### oldForkDAODeployer

???

Type: [Account][3]

### newForkDAODeployer

???

Type: [Account][3]

### event

Event meta data.

Type: ethers.Event

## ForkPeriodSet

ForkDAODeployerSet event data.

### oldForkPeriod

???

Type: [number][54]

### newForkPeriod

???

Type: [number][54]

### event

Event meta data.

Type: ethers.Event

## ForkThresholdSet

ForkThresholdSet event data.

### oldForkThreshold

The old token amount needed to successfully fork the DAO. A percentage of the token supply.

Type: [number][54]

### newForkThreshold

The new token amount needed to successfully fork the DAO. A percentage of the token supply.

Type: [number][54]

### event

Event meta data.

Type: ethers.Event

## JoinFork

JoinFork event data.
Triggers after the fork is executed, but still has a chance to rejoin the main fork.

## Indexer

Types related to the indexer. Including events and queries.

## FormattedEvent

Basic event details.
